text: BBC TV broadcast their first 'in-vision' weather forecast. George Cowling of the Meteorological Office presented from the BBC's Lime Grove studios with two hand-drawn weather charts pinned to an easel.

AOL and Time Warner completed their merger. At the time it was seen as a signal of the victory of the Internet over old media. Time Warner would eventually come out on top and spin AOL back out as separate company.
Apple introduced the first iPod Shuffle, a music player with no screen and flash memory.
RSS 1.0 and Reddit Developer Aaron Swartz was found dead after committing suicide.
